statements: SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_location = 'Hall A';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_name ASC, event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_time BETWEEN '10:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_id = 2;
SELECT event_id, event_name FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date = '2022-12-31' AND event_time > '18:00';
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00' ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_name LIKE 'Summer%' ORDER BY event_date ASC, event_time ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.event_id, e.event_name, e.event_date, e.event_time, t.ticket_id, t.ticket_price, t.number_of_tickets FROM EventSchedule e INNER JOIN TicketSales t ON e.event_id = t.event_id WHERE t.ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY t.ticket_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_schedule;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT event_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT * FROM seating_arrangement;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM event_schedule;
SELECT ticket_id, event_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT seat_id, event_id, seat_number, is_reserved FROM seating_arrangement WHERE is_reserved = TRUE;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM event_schedule JOIN ticket_sales ON event_schedule.event_id = ticket_sales.event_id;

SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, ticket_price, ticket_quantity, seat_number FROM event_schedule JOIN ticket_sales ON event_schedule.event_id = ticket_sales.event_id JOIN seating_arrangement ON event_schedule.event_id = seating_arrangement.event_id;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_weight > 200;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM TicketSales WHERE sale_date = '2022-12-01';
SELECT seat_number, section FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE is_reserved = FALSE ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventSchedule ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM EventSchedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets_sold FROM EventSchedule INNER JOIN TicketSales ON EventSchedule.event_id = TicketSales.event_id GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_weight FROM Wrestlers WHERE wrestler_weight > 200.00 ORDER BY wrestler_weight DESC;
SELECT seat_number, section FROM SeatingArrangements WHERE event_id = 3 AND is_reserved = FALSE ORDER BY seat_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM event_schedule ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT wrestler_name, wrestler_country FROM wrestler WHERE wrestler_gender = 'M' ORDER BY wrestler_name ASC;
SELECT seating_id, row_number, seat_number FROM seating_arrangements WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_price, ticket_quantity FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_status = 'Available';
SELECT * FROM event_schedule WHERE event_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_schedule WHERE event_id = 3;
SELECT wrestler_id, wrestler_name, wrestler_country FROM wrestler WHERE wrestler_gender = 'M';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM event_schedule JOIN ticket_sales ON event_schedule.event_id = ticket_sales.event_id;
SELECT match_id, match_duration, wrestler_name AS winner FROM match_results JOIN wrestler ON match_results.winner_id = wrestler.wrestler_id;
